channel.title: RuneScape Private Server Sources
channel.description:
Just want to throw a question that I feel should be discussed, If you have someone elses source and this source or project has been stopped, do you think it's right to release it, or should you still ask permission.
I have the RS 2006 (Vault's remake) and I'm not ready to give it out, but if I did give it out (which I won't) do you think it's right or wrong?

item.title: RuneScape Private Server Sources
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:11, topic:529944”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=648699.msg4362733#msg4362733 date=1379076007]

what about in general, would you personally release someone elses?
[/quote]I’d release “Aggaroth V3, and Deathlypvp 4.2” any day!

You do realize you know the owner of Aggroth of the Skype chat right? It was Aaron.[/quote]I was making a point

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Private Server Sources
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

regardless of the source or who made it, releasing it doesn’t break your server. it just shows everyone how efficiently your content is written, or if you just c&p tutorials.

your success in running a server depends on how you advertise and uphold your server. nothing to do with the code (other than stability of course) but that’s all in play.

two people can host the exact same base, with absolutely no changes other than names (hell, name doesn’t even need to change)
but whomever is better at speaking to the public and persuading people to play it, will win.

tl;dr who cares? release it if you want, or don’t release it. no point in making topics asking us if its right or wrong to release someone’s work.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Private Server Sources
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

It’s up the the owner to release their server. If they actually put a lot of work into it and you just release it, that’s a dick move.

Read full topic

anyways I’m of to school, discuss fellow moparians.
